title: Emily Atack stuns with new dark locks in scooping gown at Pride of Britain
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emily Atack oozes glam in a sweeping gown at the Pride of Britain Awards 2019.

The I'm A Celebrity star stepped onto the red carpet in a figure-hugging dress which showcases her super flawless curves and cleavage.

Her new dark locks fell in loose waves over her shoulders while she posed for the cameras.

She posed up a storm on the red carpet ahead of the glamorous ceremony, wearing expensive silver earrings and full-glam make-up to add to her stunning new look.

The dress complimented her glowing bronzed skin as she wowed the crowd.

Emily appeared to have a slight wardrobe malfunction in the beautiful gown.

(Image: PA)

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

She was pictured pulling up her dress which had slightly slipped out of place.
description: Emily Atack looked sensational in a stunning black gown as she attends the Pride of Britain Awards 2019
